committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to create the Beaufort Division in the District of South Carolina and designate Beaufort as the place of holding court for the new division.

summary.text: Amends the judicial code to establish the Beaufort Division in the District of South Carolina, comprising the counties of Beaufort and Jasper. States that court for the Beaufort Division shall be held at Beaufort.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to create the Beaufort Division in the District of South Carolina and designate Beaufort as the place of holding court for the new division.
